allow: Bash(cd /c/LiteCad && conda run -n cad_env python tests/test_cq_importer.py 2>&1)

Bash(cd /c/LiteCad && conda run -n cad_env python -c "
from gui.main_window import MainWindow
from modeling import FilletFeature, ChamferFeature, ShellFeature, PushPullFeature, ExtrudeFeature
from sketcher import Sketch

print\('All imports successful!'\)
print\('FilletFeature:', FilletFeature\)
print\('ChamferFeature:', ChamferFeature\)
print\('ShellFeature:', ShellFeature\)
print\('PushPullFeature:', PushPullFeature\)
print\('ExtrudeFeature:', ExtrudeFeature\)
print\('Sketch:', Sketch\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /c/LiteCad && cat << 'EOF'
# Handled actions:
handled="""
body
boolean_cut
boolean_intersect
boolean_union
box
brep_cleanup
chamfer
cone
convert_to_brep
copy
copy_body
cut
cylinder
draft
export_step
export_stl
extrude
fillet
hole
import_mesh
import_step
import_svg
intersect
lattice
loft
measure
mirror
mirror_body
move
move_body
new_sketch
nsided_patch
offset_plane
pattern
point_to_point
primitive_box
primitive_cone
primitive_cylinder
primitive_sphere
revolve
rotate
rotate_body
scale
scale_body
section_view
shell
sketch_agent
sphere
split
split_body
torus
texture
union
stl_to_cad
surface_texture
"""

# Check for missing
echo "Missing actions that might log 'nicht gefunden':"
echo "  torus"
echo "  texture \(panel action\)"
echo "  union \(panel action\)"
echo "  intersect \(panel action\)"
echo "  cut \(panel action\)"
echo "  stl_to_cad"
echo "  surface_texture"

# Check if torus primitive exists
grep -q "'torus':" gui/tool_operations.py && echo "torus: FOUND" || echo "torus: MISSING"

# Check panel synonyms
grep -q "\\"union\\":" gui/tool_operations.py && echo "union: FOUND \(panel synonym\)" || echo "union: MISSING"
grep -q "\\"intersect\\":" gui/tool_operations.py && echo "intersect: FOUND \(panel synonym\)" || echo "intersect: MISSING"
grep -q "\\"cut\\":" gui/tool_operations.py && echo "cut: FOUND \(panel synonym\)" || echo "cut: MISSING"
EOF)
Bash(cd /c/LiteCad && PYTHONPATH=. conda run -n cad_env python test/test_phase1_exit_criteria.py 2>&1)
